Staff Shorts are tidbit writings by our editorial board PERIOD Theyre mostly meant to be lighthearted but we sometimes touch on more serious important topics PERIOD They aim to express the many student voices of the University PERIOD

When David Sills V threw the horns down after scoring a touchdown against Texas last season time stood still for Mountaineer fans everywhere PERIOD

HornsDown

The horns down is one of the best taunts in college football PERIOD It takes one of the most recognizable and storied symbols in the nation and literally turns it on its head PERIOD It is also a great wrinkle in the budding rivalry between the Longhorns and Mountaineers PERIOD

There is only one problem  we as a fan base are overusing it PERIOD It was especially egregious this past weekend against James Madison PERIOD Throughout the entire game pregame included fans were throwing down the horns with reckless abandon PERIOD

Such blatant misuse of the gesture does nothing but lessen the blow to its intended target PERIOD If we use the horns down against every opponent this season then when we do face off against Texas on Homecoming the gesture will be almost devoid of meaning PERIOD

A weapon as powerful as the horns down is not meant to be misused and yet we are whipping it out as often as we please PERIOD

The horns down is like a vintage Cadillac PERIOD We should not use it as our everyday car PERIOD It should be more like our car for Sunday driving that we only bring out of the garage for special occasions PERIOD
